title: Junie B. Jones Has a Peep in Her Pocket
description: The world's funniest kindergartner is back, in her 15th book!It's almost the end of the school year, and Room Nine is taking a field trip to a farm! There's lots of fun farm stuff there. Like a real actual barn. And a real actual farmer. There's even real alive animals you can pet! Only, where's the gift shop? That's what Junie B. Jones would like to know. Surely no one would want Junie B. to go home empty-handed. . . .
author: Barbara Park
